MS: Which of the following is are an advantage of  using a HDL over directly designing circuits at  the gate level.
column3: NOT HTML
It allows the designers to choose the exact circuit structure of the resulting implementation
HDL Guarantees a one-to-one correspondence between the written code and the synthesized hardware, decreasing the risk of unintended hardware such as latches
It allows one design to be implemented in any suitable technology
It is visually intuitive, allowing the user to view logic as it's being built
It provides a uniform language to communicate designs
It allows the designer to work at a higher level of abstraction

MS: Which of the following is are an advantage of  using a HDL over directly designing circuits at  the gate level.
column3: NOT HTML
It allows one design to be implemented in any suitable technology
HDL Guarantees a one-to-one correspondence between the written code and the synthesized hardware, decreasing the risk of unintended hardware such as latches
It enables testing, debugging, and simulation of a system before any hardware is built
It is visually intuitive, allowing the user to view logic as it's being built
It allows the designer to work at a higher level of abstraction
It provides a uniform language to communicate designs

It enables testing, debugging, and simulation of a system before any hardware is built
It is easier to maintain/update/modify design
